sen.j: 神道集成（しんとうしゅうせい）は、徳川光圀の著作。
sen.e: Shinto Shusei was written by Mitsukuni TOKUGAWA.
Shinto Shusei was written by Mitsukuni TOKUGAWA.
"Shinto Shusei" was written by Mitsukuni TOKUGAWA.
sen.cmt: Shinto Shusei にダブルコーテーションを追記しました。

sen.j: 神道に関する類聚である。
sen.e: It is a collection of similar items of Shinto.
It is a collection of similar items of Shinto.
It is a collection of similar items of Shinto.

sen.j: 巻一の系図から、巻十二の一宮記倭姫世紀に至る。
sen.e: It includes the first volume of genealogy through the twelfth volume of Ichinomiya ki Yamatohime no seiki.
It includes the first volume of genealogy through the twelfth volume of Ichinomiya ki Yamatohime no seiki.
It includes the first volume of genealogy through the twelfth volume of Ichinomiya ki Yamatohime no seiki.
sen.cmt: Ichinomiyaki (the record of the highest-rank shrines)

sen.j: 凡例には「凡そ是の書の始終両部習合の邪説を排して唯一宗源の正道に帰す」とある。
sen.e: The introductory notes say "largely this book excludes the heretical doctrine of Ryobu Shugo from beginning to end and returns the doctrine to the right path of Yuiitsu Sogen."
The introductory notes say "largely this book excludes the heretical doctrine of Ryobu Shugo from beginning to end and returns the doctrine to the right path of Yuiitsu Sogen."

The introductory notes say 'largely this book excludes the heretical doctrine of ryobu shugo (dual compromise) from beginning to end and returns the doctrine to the right path of yuiitsu sogen (the one and only Shinto as origin and foundation).'
sen.cmt: ダブルコーテーションをシングルコーテーションに修正しました。Ryobu Shugo を ryobu shugo (dual compromise) に修正しました。Yuiitsu Sogen を yuiitsu sogen (the one and only Shinto as origin and foundation) に修正しました。参考：http://books.google.com/books?id=GzeODCVG26UC&pg=PA421&dq=yuiitsu+sogen+foundation+origin&lr=&as_brr=3&hl=ja&cd=3#v=onepage&q=yuiitsu%20sogen%20foundation%20origin&f=false
